name: Metal Mafia
description:
In a transhuman future, bodies are simply meat and metal to be used or discarded. Egos sleeve into shells, clones, and robotic frames. Cities are frequently automated by limited artificial intelligence. Crime still pays.

This game follows the One Page Game Jam idea for failing in just about every way. 

When models die, they contribute their skills to other friendly units by jumping their consciousness or remote presence into a friendly body. 

Failure gives players Chips; AI-adjusted tooltips, suggestions, and bits of combat data to further increase their performance.

Chips, in turn, can be used to power skills - skills that also transfer when models die.
